page.title: 20Oxford United Football Club
page.content: Oxford United used to be called Headington United. They achieved league status in 1962. The ground is called "The Manor"it is on the London Road in Headington.The ground is quite small with a capasity of only 14,500 in the season of 1984-85.They are putting a 2m fence around the pitch with 17 gates for emergencies.They are changing the seats to non inflamable ones,because of the Bradford disaster.They are not go- ing to sell alchol before the matches. This year they won the 2nd division championships and were promoted to the first division.The manager has gone to Q.P.R. for a better salary, and the club hopes to get a player manager.I have been supporting Oxford for 4 seasons,and I have collected about 100 programes.The home supporters stand in London Road,Osler Road or Beech Road, you can also sit in Beech Road.
